data.title: Celery Seed Oil Supplier
data.text:
Description AG Organica comes into the picture by supplying 100% organic Celery Seed Oil to several reputed industries across the world. The company is one of the leading manufacturers, distributors, and suppliers of oil to both domestic and internal markets. Celery Seed Oil is extracted from the biennial plant, named Celery, having a smooth stem, soft leaves, and white flowers. The average height of the celery plant is about 30-50 cm. The plant has its origin in Asia and other countries. India is one of the primary producers of this plant along with Holland, China, Hungary, and the USA. The word celery means quick action. The plant belongs to the Umbelliferae plant family and is botanically known as Apiumgraveolens. Celery Seed Oil is extracted by applying the steam distillation method on the fresh or dried leaves of the plant along with its seeds.

Properties of Celery Seed Oil The properties of Celery Seed Oil can be categorized into two parts, viz. Physical and Chemical

Physical Properties: Celery Seed Oil is quite popular due to its physical properties which make it stand apart from others such as antioxidative, antirheumatic, antiseptic (urinary), antispasmodic, and aperitif.

Chemical Properties: The chemical components of this oil include sedanolide, sedanonic anhydride, d-limonene, selinene, and sesquiterpene alcohols. The oil also contains different fatty acids such as linoleic, myristic, palmitic, palmitoleic, stearic, petroselinic, oleic, and myristoleic.

Blending Celery oil blends with lavender, pine, opopanax, oakmoss, lovage, Tea Tree, and other spice oils.

Uses of Celery Oil Celery Seed Oil blends well with other essential oils to provide numerous health benefits. Due to the same reason, oil is effectively used by cosmetics and pharma brands for uses like:

Making health tonics

Making cosmetics product

Making fragrances

As a flavoring agent

Directions For Use

Diffusion: Use three to four drops in the diffuser

Topical use:

Apply one to two drops to the desired area.

Dilute with a carrier oil to minimize any skin sensitivity.

Caution

Keep away from children.

If pregnant or nursing, consult your doctor.

Avoid contact with eyes, inner ears, and sensitive areas.

The Celery Seed essential oil reduces menstrual problems and is beneficial for your skin and hair. No, because it is formulated only for external use. Yes, it boosts hair growth and improves the texture of your hair. It can blend well with Black pepper, Coriander, Ginger, and Lavender essential oils. Yes, you can use Celery Seed oil for Aromatherapy.
